name: Chairman’s Reserve
description: Jim Meehan of PDT in Manhattan uses an extractor to get cucumber juice for this punch. You can buy cucumber juice from your local juice store too.
keywords: coconut water, cucumber, white rum, summer
recipeIngredient: 8 ounces (1 cup) cucumber juice, from about 1 1/2 cucumbers
8 ounces (1 cup) white rum, preferably Banks 5 Island

recipeInstructions.text: Juice the cucumbers, skin and all, in a juicer, food processer or blender and strain. Combine all ingredients in a bowl and add a block of ice. Ladle into cups; garnish with cucumber slice.
